member.name: T:PantMerchant.StateController
member.summary: This class can be thought of as the Controller controller. The game's "state" determines which controller is in control of the input at a given time. The state controller keeps track of whether you are on the main menu, in the middle of the game, or about to quit.

member.summary: Vector components

member.name: F:PantMerchant.Point2D.Y
member.summary: Vector components

member.summary: A Point2D with components (0, 0)

member.name: P:PantMerchant.Point2D.ScreenMiddle
member.summary: A Point2D which represents the middle of the game window (in pixels).
member.remarks: This property is lazily evaluated, as it needs to be reflective of screen-size changes.

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.#ctor
member.summary: Initialises a new Point2D instance with X and Y set to zero.

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Initialises a new Poin2D instance with X and Y set.
member.param: Value to set X component to
Value to set Y component to

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.ToString
member.summary: Enables printing the class.

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.GetRelativePosition(PantMerchant.Point2D)
member.summary: Returns the displacement of the provided Point2D from the current one. How many X units and how many Y units to travel to go from this one to the provided one.
member.param: Point2D to compare with this one.
member.returns: Point2D representing the displacement between the provided one and the current one.

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.op_Equality(PantMerchant.Point2D,PantMerchant.Point2D)
member.summary: Determines if the coordinates are equal. Returns true if X and Y components are respectively equal.
member.param: First Point2D
Second Point2D
member.returns: True if Point2Ds refer to the same coordinate

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.op_Inequality(PantMerchant.Point2D,PantMerchant.Point2D)
member.summary: Determines if the coordinates are not equal. Returns true if X and Y components are respectively not equal.
member.param: First Point2D
Second Point2D
member.returns: False if Point2Ds refer to the same coordinate

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if the object is equal to the current Point2D. Returns true if obj is a Point2D and X and Y components are respectively equal.
member.param: Object to compare
member.returns: True if obj is a Point2D and refers to the same coordinate as current Point2D

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.GetHashCode
member.summary: Gets hash code based on the sum of the X and Y coordinates.
member.returns: Hash code based on sum of components

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.op_Addition(PantMerchant.Point2D,PantMerchant.Point2D)
member.summary: Performs vector addition on two Point2Ds
member.param: Point2D to sum
Point2D to sum
member.returns: Returns the vector sum of p1 and p2

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.op_Subtraction(PantMerchant.Point2D,PantMerchant.Point2D)
member.summary: Performs vector subtraction on two Point2Ds
member.param: Point2D to perform subtraction on
Point2D to subtract from p1
member.returns: Returns the vector sum of p1 and -(p2)

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.op_Multiply(PantMerchant.Point2D,System.Single)
member.summary: Performs scalar multiplication on a vector p with d
member.param: The vector to multiply
The scalar to multiply the p by
member.returns: The product of p and d

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.op_Division(PantMerchant.Point2D,System.Single)
member.summary: Performs scalar division on a vector p with i, rounding the components of p to the nearest integer. Equivalent to multiplying p by the reciprocal of i
member.param: The vector to perform the division on
The scalar to divide p by
member.returns: The quotient of p by d

member.name: M:PantMerchant.Point2D.op_Implicit(PantMerchant.Point2D)~SwinGameSDK.Point2D
member.summary: Performs implicit conversion between PantMerchant's Point2D and SwinGame's in-built Point2D class.
member.param: PantMerchant Point2D to convert

member.summary: Performs implicit conversion between PantMerchant's Point2D and SwinGame's in-built Point2D class.
member.param: SwinGame Point2D to convert

member.name: T:PantMerchant.MenuType

member.summary: Menu elements are placed automatically, filling the container.

member.name: F:PantMerchant.MenuType.Manual

member.name: T:PantMerchant.UIElement
member.summary: Base class for any element of the UI. All buttons in all menus, HUD displays, etc. Anything from a "New Game" button on the main menu to an in-game minimap, to a dropdown context menu should inherit from this class. Can also act as a container for other UI Elements.

member.name: P:PantMerchant.UIElement.Name
member.summary: Internal name given to the UI element.

member.name: P:PantMerchant.UIElement.ScreenPos
member.summary: The on-screen coordinates of the UI element

member.name: P:PantMerchant.UIElement.Pos
member.summary: The position of the UI element. These coordinates are on screen. Where the UI element is a part of a UI container, the position is relative to the position of the container, otherwise is relative to the program window.

member.name: P:PantMerchant.UIElement.Size
member.summary: The width and height of the UI element. Each component of the Point2D refers to the distance of that point from it's corresponding component in the Pos property.

member.name: P:PantMerchant.UIElement.ScreenSize
member.summary: The on-screen size of the UI element. Used when the container type is auto.

member.name: P:PantMerchant.UIElement.Container
member.summary: The container of the UI element. For when UI elements need to exist within context menus, popup menus, etc.

member.name: P:PantMerchant.UIElement.Image
member.summary: Image to draw to screen

member.name: M:PantMerchant.UIElement.#ctor(System.String,PantMerchant.Point2D,PantMerchant.Point2D)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the UIElement class with the given name, position and size.
member.param: Name given to the UI element
Position of the UI element
Size of the UI element

member.name: M:PantMerchant.UIElement.#ctor(System.String,PantMerchant.Point2D,PantMerchant.Point2D,PantMerchant.UIContainer)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the UIElement class with the given name, position and size, within the given UIContainer.
member.param: Name given to the UI element
Position of the UI element
Size of the UI element
UIContainer containing the new UIElement
